verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou canst \w do|strong="H3201"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w thought|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* hid \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thee.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* hideth \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*? \w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* spoken unwisely, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w things|strong="H6381"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w above|strong="H4480"\w* measure exceeded \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w do|strong="H4994"\w* thou \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*.

\w With|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w hearing|strong="H0241"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* thee, \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* seeth thee.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* reprehend \w myself|strong="H5162"\w*, \w and|strong="H6083"\w* do penance \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w and|strong="H6083"\w* \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Eliphaz|strong="H0464"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Themanite: \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3559"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* hath.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* unto \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w oxen|strong="H6499"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* holocaust: \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w folly|strong="H5039"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* imputed \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w right|strong="H3559"\w* \w things|strong="H5973"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* hath.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Eliphaz|strong="H0464"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Themanite, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Baldad \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Suhite, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Sophar \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Naamathite|strong="H5284"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* accepted \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* penance \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H7725"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w twice|strong="H4932"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w much|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* before.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sisters|strong="H0269"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w ate|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* bemoaned \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* ewe, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w earring|strong="H5141"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* fold.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* more than \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w yoke|strong="H6776"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* she asses.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w seven|strong="H7658"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8034"\w* \w he|strong="H0259"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* Dies, \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* Cassia, \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* Cornustibil.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* \w as|strong="H3303"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w lived|strong="H2421"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w things|strong="H0702"\w*, \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w childrenâ€™s|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, unto \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fourth|strong="H0702"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* died \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* full \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w days|strong="H8141"\w*.
